item.description:
Dear Friends,

I want to have a meet up at my house at 2pm this Sunday April 15th, and want to invite you all. I would like to share with you what I know about St John of the Cross and hear anything you would like to share too. He was a famous mystic who wrote a book called the dark night of the soul and he is know for his beautiful poetry about the lover and the beloved. Let me know if you can make it.

In Light,
Rev Gabrielle

617-852-2822

Center of Light
97 Perkins St
Jamaica Plain, MA
02130
item.name: St John of the Cross
